function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High rate of particle emission during vocalization and breathing activities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to higher particle emission","Mitigation":"Use of masks and physical distancing to reduce exposure to emitted particles","Technologies":"HEPA filters and ventilation systems to remove particles from the air","People":"Individuals in close proximity to the person emitting particles","Owner":"Health organizations, building managers"},{"Description":"Difficulty in discriminating between airborne transmission and transmission through respiratory droplets","Impact":"Uncertainty in understanding the transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved sampling conditions and more advanced detection methods for distinguishing transmission routes","Technologies":"Advanced samplers for better virus detection, real-time monitoring technologies","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Detection of viral RNA in aerosols in hospital environments","Impact":"Risk of potential airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict ventilation and air purification measures, use of personal protective equipment for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV germicidal irradiation, negative pressure rooms","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams"}]}
